vladimirBuko.title: Vladimir Buko
vladimirBuko.description: Vladimir Buko is an experienced martial arts instructor with more than 20 years of experience. He has developed his own style, combining various combat techniques focused on effective self-defense in everyday life.

group.title: Group Training
group.description: Join regular group training sessions at Punch Fitness in Essen. For beginners and advanced students.

private.title: Private Training
private.description: Individual training with Vladimir Buko at Punch Fitness facilities or in fully equipped private training spaces.

seminars.title: Seminars
seminars.description: Vladimir is available for seminars at police departments, military facilities, other public institutions, and corporate events.
